summary: Completed comprehensive testing of automatic Login ID generation system for employee onboarding. All backend APIs working correctly (8/8 tests passed). Frontend UI functional with proper Login ID preview, company setup, and navigation. Login ID format validation confirmed: [CC][FN][LN][YYYY][SSSS] where CC=OD (Odoo India), serial numbers increment correctly.
passed_tests: API Health Check - Backend running correctly
Login ID Preview API - Generates correct format (ODTEUS20250008)
Login ID Format Validation - All test cases passed (ODJODO2022, ODJASM2022, ODBOWI2025)
Employee Signup - Creates account with auto-generated Login ID and JWT token
Employee Login - Authentication works with generated Login ID
Duplicate Email Prevention - Properly blocks duplicate registrations
Frontend Login Page - All elements present and functional
Frontend Signup Page - Login ID preview working with real-time generation
Frontend Company Setup - Shows 'Odoo India' setup complete
Serial Number Increment - Numbers properly increment (0005, 0006, 0008)
Login ID Read-only - Preview field shows lock icon, non-editable
Navigation Flow - All page transitions working correctly
